attributes.action: stop being a champion of the environment until other countries catch up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our citizens are being taxed , punished and inconvenienced in the name of environmental excellence. In effect, we are insignificant against the US China India etc. put all environmental tax increases on the back burner until other countries at least make a token effort at being where we already are. Why should we pay when no one else is pulling thier weight
